heading: wudijo Dies to Disconnect at Level 93 in HC SSF Race
content: In a tragic turn of events wudijo has died to a disconnect while racing to 100 on hardcore. We've been tracking the Season 1 race on our and he's been leading the Solo Self Found pack for most of the race. Sadly yesterday at level 93 he has perished opening up the lane for rest of the Solo Players to race for glory. Since his death has reached level 100 on SSF bringing an end to the group and SSF races to 100. Congrats to everyone who raced to 100 already and good luck to those still pushing for it! If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
